49.2. [Walahfrid Strabo] Breuissimam adnotationem in Exodum.
Annotations | Exodus
Manuscripts:
1. Cambrai, Bibliothèque municipale 304, f. 83vb-127rb. saec. xii. Follows Stegmüller 8316. (S) *
2. Cambridge, Trinity College 47 (B.2.4), f. 112va-152vb. saec. xii. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7021. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S)  *
3. Einsiedeln, Stiftsbibliothek 184 (190), p. 184-272. saec. x ex; O: Einsiedeln (Hoffmann). Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 8316. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
4. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 43 (266), f. 64rb-93rb. saec. xii. Grande Chartreuse. Follows Hrabanus, On Genesis. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy; variant texts, all fused with selections from Isidore. *
5. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 267 (346), f. 129vb-182vb. saec. xiii. Charteuse of Ecouges. Follows Hrabanus, On Genesis. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, [Numbers and Deuteronomy.] Variant texts, all fused with selections from Isidore. *
6. Karlsruhe, Landesbibliothek Aug. perg. 231, f. 54v-74v. saec. x. Reichenau. No prologue. No couplet. Follows Walahfrid on Leviticus and Walahfrid (?) On Genesis. (S) *
7. Le Mans, Bibliothèque municipale 213, f. 79ra-117ra. saec. ix-x (Albarello (citing Bischoff): saec. ixmid.). La Couture. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Aug. DGAL. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. *
8. Linz, Studienbibliothek 386 (97), f. 41v-92v. saec. xii. Garsten. Prologue. No couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. (S) *
9. Linz, Studienbibliothek 481 (41), f. 129-158. saec. xiii; Baumgartenberg. (S) *
10. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 5116, f. 36v-72r. saec. xii. Beurberg. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus and Numbers, Haimo on Deuteronomy, Hrabanus on Judges and Ruth. *
11. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 6221, f. 98v-102v. saec. xi1 (Albarello: saec. xii). Freising. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. *
12. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 6227, f. 20v-44v. 957-994 (Albarello: saec. x-xi). O-P: Freising. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus and Numbers, Haimo on Deuteronomy. *
13. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 17114, f. 32va-67ra. saec. xi. Scheftlarn. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus and Numbers, Haimo on Deuteronomy, Hrabanus on Judges and Ruth. *
14. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 18528, f. 30r-65v. saec. xi. Tegernsee. Stegmüller 7194. Prologue. Couplet. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus and Numbers, Haimo on Deuteronomy, Hrabanus on Judges and Ruth. *
15. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 22307, f. 43r-60v. saec x (Albarello: saec. x-xi); Windburg. No attribution in MS. No prologue. No couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. (S) *
16. Orléans, Bibliothèque municipale 31 (28), p. 77a-140b. saec. ix2. Fleury. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 8316. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. *
17. Oxford, Ashmolean Museum 1516, f. 65ra-92va. saec. xii. Attributed to Walahfrid in MS. Follows Hrabanus on Genesis.*
18. Oxford, New College xxix, f. 93ra-123rb. saec. xiii. Prologue, Follows Hrabanus on Genesis.Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. *
19. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 9568, f. 63ra-87vb. saec xi. Follows Stegmüller 8316. *
20. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 12307, f. 90ra-141ra. saec. xii. Corbie. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 8316. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
21. Reims, Bibliothèque municipale 130, f. 3-32. saec. x (Albarello (citing Bischoff): saec. ix2/4). O:W. Germany (Bischoff); Reims (Carey). Couplet precedes Prologue. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers, Deuteronomy. (S)  *
22. Sankt Gallen, Stiftsbibliothek 283, p. 297-449. saec. ix2. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 8316. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
23. Toronto, Bergendal 108 (37), f. 101-147v. saec. xii ex.; Italy, Chiaravalle della Colomba..
24. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 31, f. 72va-107va. saec. xii. Clairvaux. Prol. No couplet. Follows Stegmüller 8316. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S) *
25. Valencia, Universitat 392 (Albarello: 1759), f. 164vb-187va. saec. xv. Prologue. No couplet. Follows Stegmüller 8316. (S) *
26. Verona, Biblioteca Capitulare LXIX (66), f. 1r-64r. saec. ix1.
27. Vienna, Österreichische Staatsbibliothek 1042 (Theol. 372), f. 52r-115v. saec. x. Prologue. Couplet. Follows Stegmüller 7194. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus and Numbers, Haimo on Deuteronomy. *
28. Wilhering, Stiftsbibliothek IX.132, f. 63r-67v. saec. xiii. No Prologue. Follows Stegmüller 7194.*
29. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4113 (Weissenburg 29), f. 2r-66v. saec. ix2. Weissenburg. Prologue. Couplet. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus, Numbers and Deuteronomy. (S)  *
30. Zwettl, Stiftsbibliothek 95, f. 32v-72v. saec. xii. Prologue. Couplet. Followed by Walahfrid on Leviticus and Numbers, Haimo on Deuteronomy. (S) *
Bibliography:
1. Albarello, Carlo, “Da Pacifico di Verona a Walafrido Strabone: La Glossa super Exodum (Verona, Bibl. Cap., Cod. LXIX, Olim 66),”   Aevum 71 (1997), 229-238.
2. -- , “Walafrid Strabo commente l’Exode: tradition textuelle et grammaire exégétique,” Recherches Augustiniennes 33 (2003), 179-207.
